patch 8.2.1557: crash in :vimgrep when started as "vim -n"

Problem:    Crash in :vimgrep when started as "vim -n". (Raul Segura)
Solution:   Check mfp pointer. (Yegappan Lakshmanan, closes #6827)

<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/39f7aa3c3124065b50f182b1d2f7ac92a0918656|patch 8.2.1556: cursorline highlighting always overrules sign highlig…>
patch 8.2.1556: cursorline highlighting always overrules sign highlighting

Problem:    Cursorline highlighting always overrules sign highlighting.
Solution:   Combine the highlighting, use the priority to decide how.
            (closes #6812)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1556: cursorline highlighting always overrules sign highlig… · vim/vim@39f7aa3
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1556: cursorline highlighting always overrules sign highlig… · vim/vim@39f7aa3
attachments.text: …hting Problem: Cursorline highlighting always overrules sign highlighting. Solution: Combine the highlighting, use the priority to decide how. (closes #6812)

<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/7d6979608ee83b06ccfab2589da3047b143defae|patch 8.2.1555: not all tests are executed on Github Actions>
patch 8.2.1555: not all tests are executed on Github Actions

Problem:    Not all tests are executed on Github Actions.
Solution:   Copy "src" to "src2" earlier. Recognize "src2" in a couple more
            places.  Add two tests to the list of flaky tests. (Ken Takata,
            closes #6798)
